adm:managed-object.name: root-dse-backend
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis: This class defines a backend to hold the Directory Server root DSE.
adm:managed-object.adm:description: This is a special meta-backend that will dynamically generate the root DSE entry for base-level searches, and will simply redirect to other backends for operations in other scopes.

adm:property.name: subordinate-base-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the set of base DNs that will be used for singleLevel, wholeSubtree, and subordinateSubtree searches based at the root DSE. If this is not provided, then the set of all user-defined suffixes will be used.

adm:property.name: show-all-attributes
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Indicates whether all attributes in the root DSE should be treated like user attributes (and therefore returned to clients by default) regardless of the Directory Server schema configuration.
